WEATHER FORECAST FOR 30 OCTOBER 2024
Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 30 October 2024
Several spells of showers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa, North-western and Northern
provinces and in Galle and Matara districts.

S
howers or thundershowers will occur at several places in the other areas of the island during
the evening or night.

F
airly heavy showers about 75 mm are likely at some places in Uva and Eastern provinces.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
